Articles.Content:
I had a dream. A KSP dream. On Laythe, there were statues. Each depicted a Kerbal, dressed in Royal garments. There was a king, a queen, and some Dukes and Duchesses in one cluster. And, about 70 metres away, one statue of a Kerbal princess, all alone. I interpreted this, as a Royal Kerbal family were very annoyed when their daughter left them to marry a commoner (Jeb, maybe?). So they sent her out, and killed the commoner. The land of the area was odd as well, as it was a river, the Royal family on one side, and the princess on the other.

EDIT: This could be an Easter egg.

Edited January 20, 2014 by Rainbowtrout

Dressing Kerbals in-game would be a very limited feature, you could only do it inside spacecraft and at Kerbin.

(a specific science report says that the atmosphere of Laythe is toxic)

statues

Anyway, maybe they took the statues from Kerbin.
